becomeCoach.title: Inspire, Mentor, and Grow
becomeCoach.subtitle: Support future talent while earning on your own schedule

howItWorks.step1Desc: Tell us about your experience and motivations. Once approved, you'll join a network of passionate professional.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We'll connect you with students based on your expertise and availability.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Share your insights through 1-on-1 or group sessions - and earn for every session you deliver.

testimonials.title: Here's what other coaches are saying

jack.name: Jack Hugo
jack.quote: Coaching on Nebula has been incredibly rewarding. It's amazing to see students grow - and getting paid to do it is a bonus.

sarah.name: Sarah Cuoco
sarah.quote: I love how flexible the platform is. I can share real-world insights on my own schedule and make a real difference.

benefits.title: Enjoy these benefits & more...
benefits.incomeDesc: Monetize your professional expertise by guiding students with valuable career insights.
benefits.scheduleDesc: Don't change your routine. Decide when and how often you want to engage.
benefits.impactDesc: Help shape future talent by making a tangible difference in their career paths.

hero.heading:
Empower your career
journey with Nebula
hero.description: Get online career coaching from the world's leading experts to help you land your dream job.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search for a coach or specialty...

home.intermediate: Weâ€™re not just an AI platform. Our qualified coaches work alongside you, offering expert guidance that elevates your experience and accelerates your growth.

vetted.title: Vetted Coaches, Proven Results
vetted.description: Our coaches are industry leaders with years of experience in their respective fields.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning Paths
personalized.description: Tailored guidance to help you achieve your specific career goals and aspirations.

flexible.title: Flexible Scheduling & Support
flexible.description: Book sessions that fit your schedule and get support from our dedicated team.

testimonials.title: This is what your peers have to say

sarah.content: Nebula connected me with a fantastic coach who helped me land my dream job. The personalized advice was a game-changer!

david.content: The mock interviews were incredibly realistic. I felt so much more confident going into the real thing. Highly recommend!

emily.content: I was feeling stuck in my career. My coach provided the clarity and strategy I needed to move forward. Thank you, Nebula!

network.title: Global Community of Coaches
network.description: Our network comprises professionals from world-renowned institutions and top-tier companies. We bridge the gap between academic theory and real-world application, offering you unparalleled access to insider knowledge and career opportunities.

programs.title: Programs to help you grow
programs.description: Nebula Immersion Programs are selective, cohort-based experiences led by industry experts. Gain practical skills and real-world project experience.
programs.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, category or coach
